CheckTitle: Ensure That the Log Metric Filter and Alerts Exist for VPC Network Firewall Rule Changes.
Description: Ensure That the Log Metric Filter and Alerts Exist for VPC Network Firewall Rule Changes.
Risk: Monitoring for Create or Update Firewall rule events gives insight to network access changes and may reduce the time it takes to detect suspicious activity.

Recommendation.Text: It is recommended that a metric filter and alarm be established for Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) Network Firewall rule changes.
